newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares up in live trade, defy main mkt fall.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares up in live trade, defy main mkt fall.

text.p: Four stocks closed higher and two were flat in 14.6-million-zloty Warsaw bourse continuous trade on Tuesday.
The remaining 15 stocks did not trade.
NFI units rose 2.6 percent in a 21-million-zloty turnover.
The continuous trading system, which currently lists 21 companies, is separate from the bourse's main single-price auction system in which the same firms and 62 others trade.
At the single-price auction session the main market's index eased 0.2 pct.
